sectionDescription: These fields control the properties for the class relationship

fields.description: States whether this is a key relationship. This should be checked if 'Part of Client Key' and/or 'Part of Supplier Key' are also checked.

sectionDescription: These fields control the properties for the supplier of the class relationship, depending on the direction.

fields.description: The role of the supplier in this relationship. e.g. If the supplier is ACTIVITY which relates to ADDRESS and a direction of 'supplier', the supplier role may be 'located at'.
The cardinality of the supplier in this relationship. e.g. a single value like '1', or a cardinality like '0..*'
States whether this is a key from the supplier.
The exclusivity of the supplier in this relationship

sectionDescription: These fields control the properties for the client of the class relationship, depending on the direction.

fields.description: The role of the client in this relationship. e.g. If the client is ADDRESS which is used in ACTIVITY and a direction of 'supplier', the client role may be 'the location for'.'
The cardinality of the client in this relationship. e.g. a single value like '1', or a cardinality like '0..*'
States whether this is a key from the client.
The exclusivity of the client in this relationship

sectionDescription: Properties relating to the definitions in previous tooling, or used as part of the original ingest process

fields.description: The unique identifier of this modeled content in Borland Together
The name of this modeled content in Borland Together
The metaclass of this modeled content
The unique identifier of the supplier in this relationship
The unique identifier of the client in this relationship
